languages.text: {n}Проктор отвечает вам прямым, бесстрастным взглядом.{/n} "Предположение, что я мог предотвратить исчезновение светила, звучит почти лестно. Однако я никогда не уклоняюсь от ответственности: пусть Император в час последнего суда определит мою степень вины в произошедшем".

{n}The Proctor looks you straight in the eye with cold impassivity.{/n} "Your suggestion that I could have prevented the disappearance of a star sounds almost flattering. And yet, I never dodge responsibility. Let the Emperor, in the hour of His final judgement, determine the measure of my guilt in what happened."
languages.original_text: {n}Проктор отвечает вам прямым, бесстрастным взглядом.{/n} "Предположение, что я мог предотвратить исчезновение светила, звучит почти лестно. Однако я никогда не уклоняюсь от ответственности: пусть Император в час последнего суда определит мою степень вины в произошедшем".

And yet I never dodge responsibility. Let the Emperor in the hour of His final judgement determine the measure of my guilt in what happened."

And yet, I never dodge responsibility. Let the Emperor, in the hour of His final judgement, determine the measure of my guilt in what happened."

And yet, I never dodge responsibility. Let the Emperor, in the hour of His final judgement, determine the measure of my guilt in what happened."

{n}The Proctor looks you straight in the eye with cold impassivity.{/n} "Your suggestion that I could have prevented the disappearance of a star sounds almost flattering. And yet, I never dodge responsibility. Let the Emperor, in the hour of His final judgement, determine the measure of my guilt in what happened."

languages.text: {n}代理人は冷淡な無表情で、まっすぐあなたの目を見つめた。{/n}「星の消失を私なら防げたかもしれないという指摘は、むしろ褒め言葉にすら聞こえます。それでも、私は決して責任から逃れるつもりはありません。この出来事における私の罪の重さは、最終審判の時に皇帝陛下がお決めになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor looks you straight in the eye with cold impassivity.{/n} "Your suggestion that I could have prevented the disappearance of a star sounds almost flattering. And yet, I never dodge responsibility. Let the Emperor, in the hour of His final judgement, determine the measure of my guilt in what happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}代理人は冷淡な無表情で、まっすぐあなたの目を見つめた。{/n}「星の消失を私なら防げたかもしれないという指摘は、むしろ褒め言葉にすら聞こえます。それでも、私は決して責任から逃れるつもりはありません。この出来事における私の罪の重さは、最終審判の時に皇帝陛下がお決めになるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Der Proktor blickt dir kalt und regungslos direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Eure Annahme, ich hätte das Verschwinden eines Sterns verhindern können, klingt beinahe schmeichelhaft. Aber ich entziehe mich niemals meiner Verantwortung. Möge der Imperator in der Stunde Seines letzten Gerichts das Ausmaß meiner Schuld bei diesen Ereignissen beurteilen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor looks you straight in the eye with cold impassivity.{/n} "Your suggestion that I could have prevented the disappearance of a star sounds almost flattering. And yet, I never dodge responsibility. Let the Emperor, in the hour of His final judgement, determine the measure of my guilt in what happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Proktor blickt dir kalt und regungslos direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Eure Annahme, ich hätte das Verschwinden eines Sterns verhindern können, klingt beinahe schmeichelhaft. Aber ich entziehe mich niemals meiner Verantwortung. Möge der Imperator in der Stunde Seines letzten Gerichts das Ausmaß meiner Schuld bei diesen Ereignissen beurteilen."

languages.text: {n}Le proctor vous lance un regard froid et impassible.{/n} « Vous semblez suggérer que nous aurions pu lutter contre la disparition d'une étoile. C'est presque flatteur. Sachez que je ne cherche jamais à fuir mes responsabilités. Je laisse le soin à l'Empereur, quand sera venu pour Lui le moment de rendre Son jugement final, de m'infliger un châtiment à la mesure de ma culpabilité. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor looks you straight in the eye with cold impassivity.{/n} "Your suggestion that I could have prevented the disappearance of a star sounds almost flattering. And yet, I never dodge responsibility. Let the Emperor, in the hour of His final judgement, determine the measure of my guilt in what happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le proctor vous lance un regard froid et impassible.{/n} « Vous semblez suggérer que nous aurions pu lutter contre la disparition d'une étoile. C'est presque flatteur. Sachez que je ne cherche jamais à fuir mes responsabilités. Je laisse le soin à l'Empereur, quand sera venu pour Lui le moment de rendre Son jugement final, de m'infliger un châtiment à la mesure de ma culpabilité. »

languages.text: {n}El Procurador te mira fijamente a los ojos con frialdad.{/n} «Sugerir que yo haya evitado la desaparición de una estrella se me antoja casi un halago. Y sin embargo no soy dado a eludir responsabilidades. Que el Emperador, llegado el momento de Su juicio final, determine en qué medida soy culpable de lo sucedido».
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor looks you straight in the eye with cold impassivity.{/n} "Your suggestion that I could have prevented the disappearance of a star sounds almost flattering. And yet, I never dodge responsibility. Let the Emperor, in the hour of His final judgement, determine the measure of my guilt in what happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Procurador te mira fijamente a los ojos con frialdad.{/n} «Sugerir que yo haya evitado la desaparición de una estrella se me antoja casi un halago. Y sin embargo no soy dado a eludir responsabilidades. Que el Emperador, llegado el momento de Su juicio final, determine en qué medida soy culpable de lo sucedido».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙直视着你的眼睛，一脸冷漠。{/n}“你的意思是说，我本可以想办法阻止那颗恒星消失，是吗？这实在是太高估我了。不过，我从来不会逃避责任。等我来到帝皇面前，接受祂最后的审判时，让祂来判断我在这件事情上的罪责吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor looks you straight in the eye with cold impassivity.{/n} "Your suggestion that I could have prevented the disappearance of a star sounds almost flattering. And yet, I never dodge responsibility. Let the Emperor, in the hour of His final judgement, determine the measure of my guilt in what happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙直视着你的眼睛，一脸冷漠。{/n}“你的意思是说，我本可以想办法阻止那颗恒星消失，是吗？这实在是太高估我了。不过，我从来不会逃避责任。等我来到帝皇面前，接受祂最后的审判时，让祂来判断我在这件事情上的罪责吧。”

languages.text: {n}Üsteğmen, soğuk bir kayıtsızlıkla doğrudan gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Bir yıldızın ortadan kaybolmasını önleyebileceğimi düşünmeniz gururumu okşadı. Sorumluluktan asla kaçmam. Yaşananlar sırasında işlediğim suçun takdiri, son yargı saatinde İmparator'a aittir."
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor looks you straight in the eye with cold impassivity.{/n} "Your suggestion that I could have prevented the disappearance of a star sounds almost flattering. And yet, I never dodge responsibility. Let the Emperor, in the hour of His final judgement, determine the measure of my guilt in what happened."

languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor looks you straight in the eye with cold impassivity.{/n} "Your suggestion that I could have prevented the disappearance of a star sounds almost flattering. And yet, I never dodge responsibility. Let the Emperor, in the hour of His final judgement, determine the measure of my guilt in what happened."
